content.rendered:
Photo by Unsplash

This Week in Genesis a bundle of new theme releases – including *another* good looking third party theme on StudioPress (that Pro Plus membership is looking better all the time…) – plus:

  • some top class theme teases,
  • more tutorials than we’ve probably ever had before,
  • a deep showcase, and,
  • an uber collection of Genesis WordPress stuff on Google+.

Let’s get to it!

Themes

First up, a stunning new theme by JT Grauke called Showcase Pro launches on StudioPress (h/t Brian Gardner)

Killer new (3rd party) theme by @jtgrauke just launched. Go check it out now — https://t.co/fStabrw166 #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/CcTdZeMASa

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) February 17, 2016

Wes Straham launches a new theme called Aspire on Appfinite

The Aspire Theme is now available for the Genesis Framework! – https://t.co/deZN9IcRqh

Let me know what you think!#genesiswp #WordPress

— Wes Straham (@WesStraham) February 12, 2016

Meet Kristie from WebSavvyMarketing (h/t Marcy Diaz)

"Get Your Website in Shape With Kristie" https://t.co/TyatEQF10D #GenesisWP @WebSavvyMrkting

— Marcy Diaz (@mjsdiaz1) February 18, 2016

Kabolobari teases his Backpack child theme.

Some progress on #backpack #genesiswp child theme today [the #blog] https://t.co/ePBOLC1mZc

— Kabolobari (@Kabolobari) February 14, 2016

First teaser from Frank at WPStudio on his Seasons e-commerce theme.

First shot of the theme I'm currently working on https://t.co/vwjSrRBkxK #genesiswp

— WPStudio (@wpstudiowp) February 16, 2016

Simple Pro Themes teases Vision Pro.

Vision Pro – – – Modern Business Genesis theme – – coming soon @SimpleProThemes https://t.co/IfdWQqCxW4 #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/wEHg6r6UuJ

— Simple Pro Themes (@SimpleProThemes) February 17, 2016

Scott Wyden Kivowitz with two theme teasers Ansel and Free Spirit from Imagely.

#Teaser of upcoming #GenesisWP themes from @imagely. These #WordPress themes are called Ansel and Free Spirit. pic.twitter.com/gkDN0bAcBH

— Scott Wyden Kivowitz (@scottwyden) February 18, 2016

Showcase

ChillyBin Web Design for just-two-questions.com

Another #genesiswp launch for the week. https://t.co/NG7aYS6rC0 #beers pic.twitter.com/qcFNZMGrCi

— ChillyBin Web Design (@chillybindesign) February 12, 2016

Scott Wyden Kivowitz for scottwyden.com

My new website design is live, built on an upcoming @imagely Genesis theme. https://t.co/YLsIKJ85Dg #GenesisWP

— Scott Wyden Kivowitz (@scottwyden) February 12, 2016

Patricia Alix Villa for ashcoxphoto.com

New brand + web design launched! Do check out https://t.co/m7gKhIBDpX. ?#genesiswp #wordpress

— Patricia Alix Villa (@PatFancyGirl) February 12, 2016

GetPhound for radtax.com (h/t Ryan Rudolph)

And @GetPhound launches another #genesiswp website this week! A simple tax services site – https://t.co/wJHqyKwRni pic.twitter.com/KLz7Pk98Ah

— Ryan Rudolph (@ryancrudolph) February 12, 2016

ChillyBin Web Design for delilahcreative.com

A new #genesiswp site for Delilah Creative has just gone live https://t.co/xZUOyLLnCX pic.twitter.com/0o3C9yyjeJ

— ChillyBin Web Design (@chillybindesign) February 15, 2016

Cody Lamar Holtz for ialivedigital.com

Released the new site today. Check it out here. https://t.co/5utOLMop0G. Also, please subscribe and help build our community. #genesiswp

— Cody Lamar Holtz (@mrcodylamar) February 16, 2016

Podcasts

On OfficeHours.fm, Carrie Dils chats with Mendel Kurland on building on your successes

I’ve got @ifyouwillit on the podcast this week. If you haven’t met this guy yet, TUNE IN! If you have, you already know you’ll tune in!

— Office Hours Podcast (@officehoursfm) February 16, 2016

Best of the rest

First up, Chinmoy Paul with tutorials on moving a sidebar above the entry content for a specific page and how to add an Avatar or Logo Before the Site Title.

Move sidebar above the entry content for specific page https://t.co/9k9dMG2isv via @genesisdevelopr #genesiswp

— Genesis Developer (@genesisdevelopr) February 13, 2016

Add Avatar or Logo Before the Site Title https://t.co/f9GqAuzy72 via @genesisdevelopr #genesiswp

— Genesis Developer (@genesisdevelopr) February 13, 2016

Nathan Rice shares a very beta, but very interesting looking Genesis Simple Schema plugin.

Any #GenesisWP folks want to try something new this weekend? It’s very much beta, but we’re actively developing it.https://t.co/AUEmXiK8pu

— Nathan Rice (@nathanrice) February 12, 2016

Robert Davis with a tutorial on How to Start Building a Child Theme For Genesis

How to Start Building a Child Theme For Genesis https://t.co/jGnTvv7GtV #webdevelopment #wordpress #genesiswp

— Robert Davis (@RanTopClub) February 13, 2016

Neil Gee with a tutorial on how to Move Header and Footer into Site Inner in Genesis

Move Header and Footer into Site Inner in Genesis https://t.co/2uT5GTDAOu #genesiswp

— Neil Gee (@_neilgee) February 14, 2016

Jackie D’Elia with a tutorial on adding a Retina ready logo to the Utility Pro theme

Adding a Retina ready logo to Utility Pro theme https://t.co/HhxsnfTc9t #GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/4C51nZjehe

— Jackie D'Elia (@SavvyJackie) February 14, 2016

BobWP shares a tutorial on Enterprise Pro.

For you do-it-youselfers > Enterprise Pro Genesis Child Theme Tutorial https://t.co/niJxiv4mIJ #genesiswp #WordPress

— BobWP (@bobWP) February 14, 2016

Sonia from Candies n Pixels with a tutorial on how to set up MailChimp with Genesis Enews Extended

Set up MailChimp with Genesis Enews Extended #genesiswp https://t.co/yKk9FezBhH pic.twitter.com/IePD8wpV2C

— Sonia (@CandiesnPixels) February 16, 2016

Bill Erickson with a tutorial on Adding Facebook Comments on Genesis (h/t Marcy Diaz)

Adding Facebook Comments https://t.co/heDETep6eb #GenesisWP

— Marcy Diaz (@mjsdiaz1) February 17, 2016

Calvin Koepke with tutorial on 6 Resources to Learn JavaScript the Right Way

6 Resources to Learn JavaScript the Right Way: https://t.co/DVzgvuqp6B #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/9srUQrKy2z

— Calvin Koepke (@cjkoepke) February 18, 2016

That nice chap Jon Barratt launches launches WP Clips Multisite.

It's here! WP CLIPS MULTISITE. Individually customize sites using just one #genesiswp theme! https://t.co/UNlBOoYjvC pic.twitter.com/oX5zzVCc30

— Jon Barratt (@KrolynStudios) February 18, 2016

And Sridhar with more Genesis gems for his members, including displaying staff members on an archive page grouped by staff type and adding a sliding primary navigation in Enterprise Pro.

How to display Staff members on archive page grouped by Staff type in Genesis: https://t.co/xt2sCxWNyd pic.twitter.com/9nTe0pcsfu

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) February 14, 2016

Sliding Primary Navigation in Enterprise Pro: https://t.co/VQhkkWUcEohttps://t.co/Va1FP99xx3

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) February 17, 2016

And finally…

If you still dig Genesis WordPress on Google Plus (and don’t forget the Genesis community there too) check out this Genesis WordPress collection on Google Plus with over 10,000 (yes, thousand) followers by Scott Ellis.

That’s all for this week.

And if I missed anything awesome, please give it a shout in the comments below!

See you all next week.

PS Love these updates? Want to join our super special email list? Subscribe below!

Additional reporting this week by Marriane Leguip.

excerpt.rendered: A bundle of new theme releases, more tutorials than we’ve ever had before, and an uber collection of Genesis WordPress stuff on Google+.
